sentences.english: Enable the item specified by id in the popup menu.
sentences.chinese: 開啓彈出式選單中指定代碼的項目。

sentences.english: It can be used to menu longitudinal mode, single transverse mode.
sentences.chinese: 它可以用來選單縱模，單橫模等。

sentences.english: Allows unsubscribing of mail folders in the folder tree context menu.
sentences.chinese: 允許在資料夾樹的快顯選單中取消訂閱郵件資料夾。

sentences.english: If the Suspend and Hibernate options should be allowed in the notification area drop down menu.
sentences.chinese: 在通知區的下拉式選單上應否出現暫停及休眠選項。

sentences.english: Please click on the picture of scene of NTNU campus from the down menu.
sentences.chinese: 請從下方選單選取您想要觀看的校景照片。

sentences.english: This context menu also offers you manipulation of the panel's buttons and applets.
sentences.chinese: 內容選單也提供您許多的面板按鈕與小程式。

sentences.english: Complete management of these entries can be done via the menu editor program.
sentences.chinese: 更完整的管理介面請使用選單編輯器程式。

sentences.english: To begin, click the Offer Manager link in the left-hand toolbar menu.
sentences.chinese: 首先，請從左邊的工具欄選單點擊折扣管理鏈接。

sentences.english: The Forum Management panel is where most forum configuration is done.
sentences.chinese: 在版面管理選單內包含大部分的版面設定選項。

sentences.english: Please click on the right menu to watch the beautiful scene of NTNU campus.
sentences.chinese: 請從右邊的選單選取您想要觀看的優美校景類別。

sentences.english: Select the option you want from the pop-up menu.
sentences.chinese: 從彈出式選單選出你所要的項目。

sentences.english: To add a new folder, right-click on blank area and click Add a new folder.
sentences.chinese: 於樹狀圖右鍵選單中，點擊新增資料夾。

sentences.english: Click for a menu of available captures.
sentences.chinese: 按下它會顯示可用的字串樣式選單。

sentences.english: Fast navigation are also available in context menu.
sentences.chinese: 滑鼠右鍵選單亦提供快速導航功能。

sentences.english: Displays the common Applications menu and the Recently used files.
sentences.chinese: 顯示常用應用程式選單與最近使用的文件檔案。

sentences.english: Allows administrators to customize the site navigation menu.
sentences.chinese: 允許管理者自訂網站導覽選單。

definition: button or key (on a device)/keystroke/CL:個|个[ge4]/to press a button
